title: Dalla Academy Award Ceremony
description: I completed my calligraphy studies with the Hrofiyat team at Dalla Art Academy and was honoured with an award that capped a transformative learning journey for me. My work, displayed during the ceremony, received generous praise from faculty and guests alike, an affirmation that still resonates each time I set brush to canvas. I remain deeply grateful to Hrofiyat for their expert guidance and to Dalla Art Academy for hosting such a memorable evening. The techniques and insights they imparted continue to shape every stroke of my practice.
content: I completed my calligraphy studies with the Hrofiyat team at Dalla Art Academy and was honoured with an award that capped a transformative learning journey for me. The techniques and insights they imparted continue to shape every stroke of my practice.
